name: Microsoft Style Guide MCP Server Configuration Examples
description: Configuration examples for different MCP clients

vscode-extension.description: VS Code extension configuration for MCP

notes: Replace 'C:/path/to/microsoft-style-guide-pr' with the actual path to your cloned repository
On Windows, use forward slashes (/) or double backslashes (\\) in JSON paths
On Unix-like systems, you might need to use 'python3' instead of 'python'
Make sure Python and the required packages are installed before starting the server
The server must be started from the repository root directory to access the style guide files

module_not_found.solution: Run 'pip install -r requirements.txt' in the repository directory

file_not_found.problem: FileNotFoundError when accessing style guide files
file_not_found.solution: Ensure the server is started from the repository root directory

permission_denied.solution: On Unix systems, run 'chmod +x start_server.sh' to make the script executable

python_not_found.problem: 'python' is not recognized as an internal or external command
python_not_found.solution: Install Python 3.8+ and ensure it's in your system PATH, or use full path to python.exe
